Content.Text:
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
You want me to go out with you after you
already broke up with me? You really are
strange.
<PAGE>
<FACE_PATI>Well, I guess you finally realized how
amazing I am. I can't believe it took
you this long.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Alright <MYNAME>, profess your feelings to
me again here.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<ACTION_RIBBON>That was great, <MYNAME>. Since you're so
insistent, I'll get back together with
you.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm amazed at how generous I am. Don't
forget that I'm the one who made your
wish come true.
<PAGE>
Oh yeah. What should I call you? Do you
want me to just keep calling you the
same thing?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So you want me to call you <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>,
right?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Alright. I'm counting on you to be a
good girlfriend, okay princess?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Umm, <MYNAME>. I just want to be sure. Is
that ring really... for me?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Um, <MYNAME>, I mentioned before that
there was something I wanted to tell
you, right?
<PAGE>
The truth is that I was never able to
stop thinking about you. I always wanted
to get back together.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH><ACTION_RIBBON>That's why I'm so happy that this is
happening. <MYNAME>, please be my
girlfriend again!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yes! Having you here confessing to me
like this makes me feel like I'm in a
dream.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Hey, now that we're back together, do
you want to come up with new nicknames
for each other?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Alright then, <MYNAME>. I'll see you soon!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Wow. You surprised me! I was so taken
aback that I thought my hair would
all turn gray.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>Now, <MYNAME>, this type of relationship
between a man and a woman is serious
business.
<PAGE>
You can't just get together and break up
whenever you feel like it. I don't think
it's right. 
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>...Well, judging by the expression on
your face, <MYNAME>, I guess you already
knew that.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...If you're that serious, I'll take
you up on your offer.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH><ACTION_RIBBON><MYNAME>, from today onward, you and I
are a couple again.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Now that we're back where we started, do
you want to come up with new nicknames
for each other?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Alright, my little <MYNAME>, I've got it.
What's that? You want me to stop
treating you like a child?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Well, as punishment for breaking up with
me, I'm going to deny that request.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Now that that's settled, I'm looking
forward to being a couple with you
again.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
To speak honestly, I finally managed to
let go of my feelings for you.
<PAGE>
I didn't want to hear those words from
you again.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>On the other hand, part of me is
delighted to see that ring.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<ACTION_RIBBON><MYNAME>, would you be so kind as to give
that ring to me. Let's try to start over
again.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now what shall we do about our
nicknames? Would you like to come up
with new ones?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>, let's try not to make the same
mistakes that we made last time we
dated.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
You're the one who said you wanted to
break up with me! Right?! Why are you
professing your feelings for me again?
<PAGE>
If you were going to do this, you
shouldn't have dumped me and broken my
heart in the first place!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...Argh! I mean, I... um...
<PAGE>
Who am I kidding? I still like you too!
I'm sorry!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What do you think? Now that we're a
couple again, should we change our
nicknames for each other?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, that's what I'll call you, then.
You can call me what you want, just like
before.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...Well, I'm glad we've settled that.
See ya later.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I'm shocked. I had no idea that you
would do that.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But I was very happy when you did
because I actually was never able to
forget about you.
<PAGE>
I kept loving you, thinking that one day
I could let you go naturally. I'm happy
I don't have to do that anymore.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, that's right, now that we're a
couple again, do you want to change our
nicknames for each other.
My name is fine as it is

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
All right then, <MYNAME>. I'm sure things
will go well this time.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Wow! I haven't been this surprised in a
long time! I mean, there haven't been
any big scoops recently, you know?
<PAGE>
But that's not the point. Are you really
serious, <MYNAME>?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...To think that we still have feelings
for each other. This seems too good to
be true.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<ACTION_RIBBON>I like you too, <MYNAME>.<RED>∀</RED> Let's start
over!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I know we just got back together, but
let's come up with nicknames for each
other. What should I call you?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, <MYNAME>. Let's stay together this
time!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When you showed me that ring, were you
saying that you want me to be your
girlfriend again?
<PAGE>
If you were, then I'd really like you
to show me the ring one more time.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ha ha! Yay! I felt the same way, but I
couldn't say it!<RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
<ACTION_RIBBON>Of course my answer is yes!<RED>∀</RED> Thanks,
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's wonderful that we're a couple
again. What should I call you now? Do
you want to change your nickname?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME> it is.<RED>∀</RED> I know we'll make a
great couple this time!

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Which reminds me... That ring.
<PAGE>
That's the kind of thing that's used
when professing one's love... Am I
wrong?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
<ACTION_RIBBON>If this is the last time... I accept...
This time... come to see me more...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you... want a new nickname? Tell
me... okay?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Okay... I've got it. <MYNAME>... I'm happy
we're together again.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Am I correct in assuming that you just
confessed to me? But we already broke
up...
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, I haven't been able to let go of
my feelings for you either... Are you
sure about this?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<ACTION_RIBBON><MYNAME>...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I understand. I've also made up my mind.
This time we'll stay together no matter
what.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Since we're a couple again, would you
mind if I called you by a new nickname?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay. Well then, <MYNAME>, I'm looking
forward to being with you again.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Even after we broke up, I couldn't
stop thinking about you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Please show me the ring one more time.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Even though I wasn't expecting a
miracle, I kept hoping that the time
would come when we could start over.
<PAGE>
That's why this is so wonderful.
<MYNAME>, thank you so much for choosing
me again.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Let's show how close we are again by
coming up with new nicknames for each
other.
<PAGE>
I suppose we could also just call each
other by our regular names. What do you
think?
My name is fine as it is

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Please come to see me much more than you
did before, all right?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow. I can see that you're still really
obsessed with me, my little <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I actually started to get the feeling
that this would happen about a week ago!
Hurry up and show me that ring again.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<ACTION_RIBBON>Okay, I was starting to get bored
anyways. I'll go out with you again.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Oh, what's that? If we're going to be in
a relationship you want me to call you
by a different name?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Too much of a pain, sorry. <MYNAME> is
just fine. Don't complain too much or
I'll have to reconsider dating you.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yes, yes. It's fine how it is.
<PAGE>
More importantly, now that we're a
couple, you better be a willing subject
for all my experiments.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yes, yes. It's fine how it is.
<PAGE>
More importantly, now that we're a
couple, you better be a willing subject
for all my experiments.
